Apple called and said the amount I paid for the iPhone was too little as it did not include the VAT. Please send them the difference of an additional 19.5% of the amount we paid + a fee of 5.29.

To address Apple's request, you need to calculate 19.5% of the original iPhone purchase price and add a fee of $5.29. If you're able to share the original purchase price, I can help with the exact calculation.
